img_above_text:
![Wukong Karma 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/80/Wukong_Karma_12.jpg)
Stick to staying in safe spots to keep using Thrust Stance out of the range of his roots, or Pillar Stance above him, and look for his many openings when he tumbles to the ground to press the attack, and he'll fall before long, granting you both the **Old Ginseng Guai Spirit** , Millenium Ginseng Seeds to give to Chen Loong, and the **Ginseng Cape** to wear.
img_below_text: With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Karma 12.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/80/Wukong_Karma_12.jpg)
Stick to staying in safe spots to keep using Thrust Stance out of the range of his roots, or Pillar Stance above him, and look for his many openings when he tumbles to the ground to press the attack, and he'll fall before long, granting you both the **Old Ginseng Guai Spirit** , Millenium Ginseng Seeds to give to Chen Loong, and the **Ginseng Cape** to wear."
        - Following Text: "With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the player character near a snow-covered table behind a large stone monument. A red arrow highlights an interactable item labeled "Pick Up," which is likely the **Jade Essence**, a Gourd Drink that restores both mana and health. This item is found after defeating the Yaoguai Chief miniboss, as mentioned in the accompanying text.
